text: (eyaṭa) ohu, (ovunṭa) mesē pævasuvēya: “(magē) janatāveni! oba avadhānaya kaḷehuda? magē deviyangē sādhakayan kerehi mā sthāvarava siṭiyadī da, ohu tamangē sannidhānayen (nabitvaya vana mema) varaprasādaya mā haṭa pahaḷa kara tibiyadī da, eya obagē æs valaṭa nopedhǣ, eya oba piḷikul kara dæmuvahot eya anugamanaya karana men mā obaṭa bala kaḷa hækida?”
